alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. John The Baptist, central Ascension, northern St. James and south central Livingston Parishes through 630 PM CDT... At 544 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Sorrento, or near Gonzales. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Gramercy, Lutcher, Sorrento, French Settlement, Convent and Garyville. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 179 and 199. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension
